vajrabandhamadhyamādvayaṃ madhye parvabhaṃgaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṃgulīḥ prasārayed vikīriṇamudrā /

sādhukāraiḥ saṃtoṣya sādhu sādhu śakrapramukhā devaputrā yad yuṣmākam īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ  sajātaṃ tat sādhu pratipadyadhvaṃ deśayāmi /
